short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Topic Flower Extension allows you to categorize your Facebook updates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Topic Flower Extension allows you to categorize your Facebook updates. Using TopicFlower Chrome Extension you  will be able to Post, with tags, and much more options, and also categorize  each post and have direct impact on your Flower.
